topics.body:
"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5535578d6368726742c80600#post_5535578d6368726742c80600
Joking aside something I've noticed about a lot of fps games is that they forget to add in for short distance weapons or such; it's funny cause in games with non-infinite ammo a good way of saving ammo is to snipe a enemy with a pistol until they die.  What's even funnier is when they forget to code in the enemy AI to react to getting hit by a pistol from that range so you're hitting them from across the map with a pistol and they're completely not reacting to it.

topics.body:
I just realized; my sexuality is really weird.

Porn wise I prefer:
Traps > pre-op/post-op > women > guys > reverse traps
Dating wise I prefer:
Traps > reverse traps > guys > pre-op/post-op > women


I know I'm generalizing here, but personally the reason why it's almost a complete utter flip is that women in my age range a lot of the time I go on a date it's like "so do you like kids?"  It's like "oh my god; we just met five minutes ago.  I like taking care of kids, but you should marry someone you like not for the sake of getting married."

I'd rather fuck someone I like than marry someone I don't like who just is getting married for the sake of getting married.  Sure it may be possibly up to a decade until I eventually get married, but I don't get why people date for the sake of solely trying to get married.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
